overview:
Will Rowan is a freelance company director, specialising in marketing strategies the bring new companies to market.

Designing a business around its potential: Will has the ability to see a strategy that ï¬ts a business’ competencies and market opportunities, and to spot the factors that could cause a plan to fail:

  • recognising individual strengths, and a team’s capabilities
  • assessing a businesses’ marketplace, and the organisation’s potential
  • operationally practical, mapping the potential opportunities to the real capabilities of the company, its people and resources

Pragmatic Marketing ideas: Much ballyhoo is written about online marketing. It’s important, but “Online” doesn’t often function in isolation from the physical, analogue world, and Will is experienced in identifying:

  • strong marketing concepts that ï¬t the company, its product, their markets, needs and capabilities
  • practical, deployable campaigns that establish commercial benchmarks for products & their marketing activities …and is ready to debunk hype around the newest new thing, and champion the unfashionable channel that gets sales.

Crisp communications: There’s little point in having brilliant ideas if you keep them to yourself. After 20+ years of working in technology-led marketing disciplines with non-technical colleagues, Will can explain complex ideas with jargon-free simplicity.
